name: Deepak Chopra
description: At that time, India was under British control. To be a self-help expert, Deepak Chopra has expertise in Western medicine.

name: Sandeep Maheshwari
description: Sandeep Maheshwari also loves to do photography, and he is also the CEO and Founder of Images Bazaar, a collection of Indian images that is the largest in the world.

name: Vivek Bindra
description: Dr. Vivek Bindra is one of today's most well-known motivational speakers, business coaches, and trainers. Vivek Bindra's early life was full of struggle when he was 2.5 years old; he lost his father.
